description: This file is a Java source file defining a REST controller named 'AnalysisController' which provides endpoints for analysis and matching functionalities related to resumes and jobs. It interacts with services and repositories to handle analysis requests, matching, and retrieval of match results.

classes.name: AnalysisController
classes.description: Rest controller providing endpoints for resume analysis and matching operations, secured with Spring Security and documented with Swagger annotations.

methods.name: noMongoActive
methods.description: Checks if the 'no-mongo' profile is active, indicating whether persistence is disabled.

methods.name: analyzeResume
methods.description: Handles POST requests to analyze a resume by ID, returning an analysis result or an error if persistence is disabled.

methods.name: match
methods.description: Handles POST requests to perform resume-to-job matching, returning a match object.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list match results for the authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific match by ID for the authenticated user.
